full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JIG RTEN PA'I LHA MTHU BO CHE RNAMS LA, 'PHRIN BCOL BSANGS MCHOD GSER SKYEMS LINGGA DANG BCAS 'BUL TSUL GYI RIM PA RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(DPAL RVA SGRENG GI GDAN PAR LNGA SOR NAS GAR 'TSAMS YOD DUNG CHA TSANG BA ZHIG MI 'JUG PAS, DA LAM 'DI KHA DNGOS NAS RGYU SPYAR TE 'PHYING DKAR GTZO BO 'KHOR BCAS DANG, DUR BDAG YAB YUM GYI 'TSAMS GSAR 'JUG LA SOGS BSGRAL LAS KYANG TSANG BA'I 'TSAMS YIG BUM BSANGS KYI LINGGA ZHIG DGOS ZHES MDZOD PA ZHABS DRUNG DU BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ZHVA SER STAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU NO MON HANG BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS NGA CHA 'DI BZHIN DU SUG DRI SU BGYIS SHING, SLAR LUGS KHUNG PA RGYAS DANG BCAS BGYIS CI TZAM LAG PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS,
